title: Can I get admission in college by certificates of DigiLocker class 12th? As in the current situation of pandemic, I can't get my original marksheet. I am a private candidate of class 12. - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for A2A Yes because that was the sole motive of creating the digilocker-doing away with the hassle of keeping the original documents save and protected.  If you doubt it then this is what the official website has to say. See point 2 of Benefit to Citizens. Happy Learning.

Digital marksheets are valid so if you access your documents from digilocker then it is valid. College will accept it.then college will give you a particular time to bring your original hardcopy of documents. So don't worry, after all in this situation of pandemic no issue will create
Yes, you can get admission in college by certificates of DigiLocker of 12th. Even I also got admission in vollege by certificates of DigiLocker.
